content:
I’m Cyano, a Ph.D. student by day. During my free time I do 3D printing, make 3D models, experiment with my home lab server, play video games, and watch Anime.
Tinkering # 3D Printing # I own and operate two FDM printers at the moment, a Prusa Mk4 and an Ender 3 v2. I am also in the process of building my Voron 2.4.
3D Modeling # I self-taught SolidWorks and Fusion 360 when I was part of a robotics club at my university. I mostly make functional mechanical parts, but I’m also branching into artistic models.
Home Lab # I built a home lab server using old PC parts and installed Proxmox on it. I run various VMs and containers for all kinds of services.
Entertainment # Video Games # I am a big fan of PC games, particularly in the shooter and simulation categories. Currently, I am actively playing Helldivers 2 and War Thunder.
Anime # TBD.
summary: I’m Cyano, a Ph.D. student by day. During my free time I do 3D printing, make 3D models, experiment with my home lab server, play video games, and watch Anime.
title: About
